description: This file defines an API client using axios for HTTP requests, configured with a base URL, JWT authentication handling, and response error management, specifically for handling 401 Unauthorized responses by clearing tokens and redirecting to login.

methods.name: axios.create
methods.description: Creates an axios instance with specified configuration settings.

methods.name: api.interceptors.request.use
methods.description: Sets up a request interceptor to attach JWT token if present.

methods.name: api.interceptors.response.use
methods.description: Sets up a response interceptor to handle 401 Unauthorized responses globally.
